General.Name: Nexera Energy Inc
General.Description: Nexera Energy Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of petroleum and natural gas properties principally in Canada and the United States. The company was formerly known as Emerald Bay Energy Inc. and changed its name to Nexera Energy Inc. in March 2020. Nexera Energy Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 4015 ? 1 Street South East, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 4X7
